Software developer, student, and leader.

Hi, I'm Nuri, a rising junior studying Computer Science at Franklin High School's STEM program in Elk Grove, California. I'm the tech lead for the program's official website, managing and guiding a group of developers to build an ecommerce store that opens merch orders to the student body. We are set to deploy this August.
